meanings.definition: To exert jointly with another or others.
meanings.sent1: The team coexerts to lift the heavy box together.
meanings.sent2: The students coexerted to finish the group project on time.
meanings.sent3: The ants coexerted to carry the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent4: The dancers coexerted their movements to create a beautiful performance.
meanings.sent5: The birds coexerted to build a nest high up in the tree.

meanings.definition: To act together in a common effort or operation.
meanings.sent1: The siblings coexert to clean up their room before their parents come home.
meanings.sent2: The firefighters coexerted to put out the blazing fire in the building.
meanings.sent3: The chefs coexerted in the kitchen to prepare a delicious meal for the guests.
meanings.sent4: The musicians coexerted to create a harmonious melody during the concert.
meanings.sent5: The athletes coexert to win the championship trophy for their team.
